content: Hi, I made an attempt in Bevy to unify module path resolution for code generating macroses (https://github.com/bevyengine/bevy/blob/03173641b6185f6f988570ab960c96e6fdf2063b/crates/bevy_macro_utils/src/lib.rs#L38-L49)

The problem is that it fails when running clippy. For some reason CARGO_PRIMARY_PACKAGE isn't specified. The same applies for WASM and Android compilation pipelines. Is it a bug, and where to report it if so?
